recipes.title: Spicy sweet chilli vegetable noodles
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
Heat a tbsp of oil in the wok on medium heat.
Cook the pressed tofu until golden brown then remove from the wok.
Add garlic and ginger, let cook for about a minute.
Add carrots and saute. Then add green peppers, red peppers, onion, courgette, pak choi one at a time.
In a bowl whisk together the sweet chilli, soy sauce, sriracha, water and peanut butter.
Cook the noodles according to packet directions
Add the tofu, noodles and sauce into the vegetables and mix well.

recipes.title: Roasted tomato and basil pasta
steps: Preheat the oven to 200° C and get a baking tray ready.
Halve the tomatoes and arrange them on the prepared baking tray, cut side up. Sprinkle with olive oil, dried basil, salt and pepper. Bake,.
Heat up the wok on low-medium heat. Once hot, add the pine nuts and dry-roast them until golden. Remove from wok.
Cook the pasta al dente following the packet instructions.
Add garlic to the wok, let cook for about a minute.
Add green peppers to the wok and let cook. When slightly soft add the red peppers.
Add the canned tomatoes, spices, herbs and shredded basil leaves. Simmer for ten minutes.
Add the spinach to the wok and mix in.
Turn off heat and add the pasta and baby tomatoes to the sauce.
Serve topped with pine nuts, basil and mozarella

recipes.title: Spicy scalloped potatoes and cauliflower
steps: Preheat the oven to 200° C
Mix together spices to form spice blend.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion then garlic and cook until translucent.
Add flour and spice blend, cook for a minute. Add lime juice and cook for a few seconds.
Add milk and cheese and mix well. Continue to cook until the mixture thickens.
Layer the cauliflower then potatoes in a lined baking dish.
Spread the sauce over the potatoes and cauliflower.
Bake covered at 400 deg F / 200ºc for 20 minutes.
Cook sausages
Uncover and bake another 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.

recipes.title: Breakfast Burritos
steps: Heat the oven to 200° C and put in hash browns and nuggies.
Cut halloumi into slices and add to oven slightly later.
Finely chop red onion, garlic, avocado, tomatoes and coriander and mix together for salsa.
Add cumin and squuze lime juice over salsa.
Whisk eggs together and cook for scrambled eggs.
Mix tofu and cumin to make tofu scramble.
Assemble burritos by adding a mixture of the salsa, eggs or tofu and halloumi or nuggies.

recipes.title: Vegetable lasagna
steps: Heat the oven to 200° C and line a baking dish.
In the frying pan cook garlic then add tinned tomatoes, herbs and spices.
Cook eggplant, add to a bowl. Then mushrooms. Then bell peppers.
Cook spinach, when done add ricotta and cheese.
Spoon half of the vegetables into the baking dish followed by half the tomato sauce and lasagna sheets.
Repeat the above step.
Cover the top with spinach and ricotta mixture then bake for 20mins covered and 10 mins uncovered.

recipes.title: Tomato, sausage and spinach risotto
steps: In a pot, bring the tomatoes and the broth to a light simmer.
Heat the oil in the wok over medium-high. Add the sausage and break into pieces.
Add the garlic to the wok.
Add the rice and toss to coat. Toast 1 minute.
Add the wine and simmer until most of it evaporates, 1 minute.
Pour the tomato stock into the skillet, one ladle at a time. Stirring continuously.
Remove from heat and toss in the butter and cheese.
Add the spinach and toss until wilted.

recipes.title: Curried sausage
steps: In a frying pan cook the sausages until browned all over. Transfer to plate.
In the wok add onion, carrot and garlic. Once slightly cooked add bell peppers.
Meanwhile start cooking the rice.
When vegetables are softened add the curry powder and cumin. Stir to coat for a minute.
Add fruit chutney and stock. Return sausages to pan.
Cover, bring to the boil then simmer for 10 minutes.
If sauce is not thickening add a cornstrarch slurry.
Stir in peas and cook for several minutes.

recipes.title: Japanese curry
steps: Drain and press the tofu
Heat the wok and add some oil. Once hot add the onion and cook till softened.
Add the garic and potatoes.
In another pan fry the pressed tofu slices until golden brown.
In the wok when the potatoes have softened add the carrot.
Start cooking the rice
Once carrots are tender cover mixture in boiling water. Add the courgette and simmer until vegetables are cooked.
Turn off the heat, add the tofu and break in the golden curry block
Stir until block is completely dissolved, simmer a few more minutes.

recipes.title: Cajun tofu with coriander lime rice
steps: Drain and press the tofu
Mix the spices (only use half the cumin) with 1 tbsp of the lime juice and some olive oil to make a paste.
Rub the paste mix on the tofu and sit for 15 mins.
Bake the tofu in the oven for 20 - 30 mins at 180° C.
Cook the rice.
Finely chop red onion, garlic, avocado, tomatoes and half the coriander and mix together for salsa.
Add cumin and squeeze one tbsp of lime juice over salsa.
Mix the remaining chopped coriander and lime juice into the rice.

recipes.title: Cheddar and green chile waffles
steps: Finely chop and cook the chillies, set aside.
In a large bowl whisk together flour, cornmeal, baking powder, 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon salt, and cayenne pepper.
Add milk, remaining 2/3 cup olive oil, and eggs, and maple syrup, whisking to combine.
Fold in the cheddar cheese and chiles.
Spray waffle iron with cooking spray. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
Eat half of the waffles while cooking because Jess said so.

recipes.title: Devilled sausages
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C
Pan fry sausages until cooked.
Fry onion, apple and garlic in the pan until soft.
Cut sausages into pieces.
In a baking tin mix the sausages, onion, apple and garlic.
Mix together remaining ingredients and pour over sausages.
Bake in the oven for 20 mins.
Cook rice.

recipes.title: Nachos
steps: In the wok cook the onion. Add in this order: garlic, carrot, green pepper, red pepper, courgette, mince, beans.
Add whatever spices tickle your pickle, unless it's five tbsp of chilli powder.
Add the tinned tomatoes and simmer.
Arrange corn chips on plates and pour mixture over.
Top with chopped avocado.

recipes.title: French toast
steps: Whisk together eggs, milk, salt, sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon in a shallow and flat dish.
Place bread slices, one or two at a time, into the egg mixture and flip to make sure both sides of bread are well-coated.
Melt butter in a the frying pan.
Place bread slices in frying pan and cook until golden brown on each side.
Top with berries, banana, maple syrup or whatever toppings you have.

recipes.title: Vegan curry laksa
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
Toast the coriander and cumin seeds until fragrant. Add to a blender and blend to a coarse mixture.
Add the tumeric, ginger, chile, cayenne, lemongrass, garlic, cashews, coriander and lime juice and blend until a paste.
Cook the pressed and sliced tofu until golden brown, remove from the pan.
In the wok on medium heat add the curry paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the carrot, green pepper, red pepper, mushroom, courgette and pak choi stems. Pausing between each one to cook them.
Add the broth, tofu and coconut milk and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and add noodles. Simmer until noodles are cooked.

recipes.title: Gratin
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C and line the casserole dish.
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/8-inch slices.
Melt butter over medium heat. Cook onion in butter, stirring occasionally, add garlic and cook until tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, until bubbly. Remove from heat.
Slowly stir in milk and 1 1/2 cups of the cheese. Heat to boiling, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute until the cheese is completely melted.
Spread potatoes in casserole dish. Pour cheese sauce over potatoes. Bake uncovered for 1 hour.
Mix remaining cheese and bread crumbs, sprinkle over potatoes. Bake uncovered 15 minutes or until top is brown and bubbly.

recipes.title: Pasta bake
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C and line the casserole dish.
In the wok cook the sausages and break into pieces. Add the garlic and chilli flakes.
Once garlic is cooked add the canned tomatoes and simmer.
Add the water and penne, simmer until pasta is cooked. Remove from heat.
Stir in the cream, ½ cup of the Parmesan, and 3 tablespoons of the basil.
Transfer to the casserole dish and sprinkle the mozzarella and remaining ¼ cup Parmesan on top.
Bake uncovered in the oven for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with remaning basil and fancy mozarella.

recipes.title: Gnocchi
steps: Preheat oven to 180° C and line the casserole dish.
In the wok cook the onion, once cooked add the garlic and chilli.
Add the green pepper then the red pepper until cooked.
Add the canned tomatoes and the herbs and spices, simmer for 10 minutes.
Cook the gnocchi as per packet instructions.
Stir the spinach and fresh basil into the wok, once cooked add the gnocchi and remove from heat.
Transfer to the casserole dish and sprinkle half the mozzarella on top.
Bake uncovered in the oven for 10 minutes. Sprinkle with basil and fancy mozarella.

recipes.title: Peanut lentil stew
steps: Heat some oil in the wok.
Cook the onion then ginger and garlic, until softened.
Add the potatoes and cook for a bit, then add the carrot.
Add the green pepper, red pepper and courgette along with the spices.
Pour in the stock and lentils then bring to a boil and simmer for ten minutes.
Add in the tomatoes and peanut butter, simmer until all vegetables are cooked.

recipes.title: Honey sriracha sesame tofu
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
Cook drained and sliced tofu until brown, remove from pan.
Cook the rice.
Add ginger and garlic into pan and cook until softened.
Add the carrot, green pepper, red pepper, courgette and pak choi stalks in that order.
Mix together the soy sauce, vinegar, honey, Sriracha, red chili flakes and water.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and cook until sauce has thickened.
Add pak choi leaves in and mix until cooked.

recipes.title: Teriyaki
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
In a sauce pan mix the water, soy sauce, mirin, sesame oil, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, pepper and onion.
Once boiling, add cornstarch slurry, simmer until the consistency is thick.
Cook drained and sliced tofu in the wok until brown, remove from pan.
Cook the rice and preheat oven to 200° C.
In a pan sear the salmon until all sides are brown.
Cook salmon in the oven for roughly 15 minutes.
Add carrot, green pepper, red pepper, courgette, pak choi stalks and leaves in that order to the wok.
Add tofu back to the wok to heat up.

recipes.title: Pizza
steps: Put the flour into a large bowl, then stir in the yeast and salt.
Make a well, pour in 200ml warm water and olive oil and mix with a wooden spoon until you have a soft, fairly wet dough.
Turn onto a lightly floured surface and knead for 5 mins until smooth.
Cover with a tea towel and set aside.
In a pan cook the garlic until soft.
Add the canned tomatos, herbs, spices and some of the fresh basil.
Preheat the oven to 220° C.
If you’ve let the dough rise, give it a quick knead, then split into several balls.
On a floured surface, roll out the dough into large rounds, about 25cm across, using a rolling pin.
Lift the rounds onto two floured baking sheets.
Smooth sauce over the base and add cheese. Bake in oven for 8 - 10 minutes or until crisp.
Top with fresh basil.

recipes.title: Butter Paneer
steps: Heat some oil in the wok and add the minced onions. Fry until golden brown.
Add the ginger, garlic and green pepper. Then add the red pepper and eggplant.
Cook the rice and naan.
Add the cumin, coriander, chilli powder, turmeric, and salt. Fry for a minute until fragrant.
Add the tinned tomatoes and cook until mixture starts bubbling.
Thrown in the milk, and the cubed paneer. Cook covered for 8-10 mins until everything is cooked.
When done, add the garam masala and the cream or cashew paste.

recipes.title: Enchiladas
steps: Preheat oven to 220° C
In a pan cook the onion. Once softened add the garlic and carrot.
Add the green pepper, red pepper, courgette in order leaving each a few minutes to cook.
In a seperate pan cook the chicken.
Stir in the beans, chili powder, cumin, and sugar, cook for 30 seconds. Stir in the tinned tomatoes. Bring to a simmer, and cook until slightly thickened.
Strain the sauce through a strainer into a medium bowl.
Add 1/2 cup cheese, the coriander and 1/4 of the sauce to the onion mixture
Microwave the tortillas.
Spoon the filling into the totillas and tightly roll then place on a baking tray.
Throw sauce all over the floor, pour what remains on top of the enchiladas along with some cheese.
Bake in the oven until heated through.
Serve with sliced avocado.

recipes.title: Masala frittata
steps: In a pan cook the onion. Once softened add the peppers.
Add the green pepper, red pepper, courgette in order leaving each a few minutes to cook.
Add the Madras paste and fry for 1 min more, then tip in the cherry tomatoes and the chilli.
Finely chop red onion, garlic, avocado, tomatoes and half the coriander and mix together.
Add cumin and squeeze lime juice over salsa.
Add the remaining coriander and eggs to the onion mixture and cook until egg has set stirring infrequently.

recipes.title: Mint oreos
ingredients: A few drops green food colouring
steps: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl beat the butter, sugar and vanilla.
Beat in the egg white. Add the flour mixture and beat just until incorporated.
Place the dough on your work surface and, using your hands, form the dough into a log shape.
Carefully wrap the dough in parchment paper and fold the ends. Refrigerate for at least one hour or overnight.
Preheat the oven to 180° C. Line two baking sheets.
Slice dough into 1/4 inch thick wafers. Place on the baking sheet about 2.5 cm apart. Bake for approximately 10-12 minutes.
To make icing cream butter and add cream cheese, mint extract, food coloring and mix well.
Add powdered sugar slowly until you reach your desired consistency.
Ice one cookie then smoosh another one on top of the icing.

recipes.title: Protein pancakes
steps: Put the banana in a bowl and mash with a fork.
Add the eggs and mix until well combined.
Put the oats in a blender and blend until fine.
Add the blended oats and cinnamon to the banana mix, and stir well.
Heat a skillet over a medium heat with a dash of vegetable oil.
Pour 1/4 cup of mixture into skillet, cook on both sides.

recipes.title: Peanut butter protein balls
ingredients: 2-4 teaspoons water or additional vanilla extract
steps: In a medium mixing bowl, stir together the peanut butter, brown rice syrup or honey and vanilla extract.
Stir in the oats, coconut and salt until well combined and then add the chocolate chips.
If the mixture doesn’t hold together well when pinched together, add the additional water or vanilla.
Form 1” balls by pressing about 1 tablespoon of the mixture together.
Store at room temperature for up to 3 days or refrigerate for 1 week.

recipes.title: Tacos
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
Preheat the oven to 180° C.
Mix spices and rub with some olive oil over the chopped vegetables, tofu and halloumi.
Roast vegtables in oven.
Cut red onion, avocado and mango into slices.
Assemble the tacos.

recipes.title: Orange tofu
steps: Drain and press the tofu.
Add cubed tofu to a large bowl. Sprinkle 1 tbsp cornstarch, flour, salt, garlic, and pepper.
Close the top of the bowl with a plate or lid and shake to coat.
Add more cornstarch and shake again.
Bake at 200° C for 25 to 35 min. Shake at the midway point.
Wash and cook the rice.
Start cooking vegetables in order (green pepper, red pepper, broccoli, courgette, onion, pak choi stems).
Combine all the ingredients for orange Sauce, except water and cornstarch in a saucepan.
Bring sauce to a boil. Mix cornstarch in warm water and add into the sauce.
Add the baked tofu to the vegetables and pour over the sauce.

recipes.title: Key lime avocado pie
steps: Blend all ingredients up to (not including) avocado together.
Press evenly into bottom of tin and freeze.
Blend all remaining ingredients together.
Put into the same tin as the base and freeze for ~two hours.

recipes.title: Amazing asian salad
ingredients: Noodles - whatever is in the pantry
steps: Cut everything really finely
Mix sauce in bowl
Cook noodles according to packet instructions
Add sauce to noodles

recipes.title: Burritos
steps: Cook the rice.
In a large bowl mix the sliced bell peppers, 1 red onion and the garlic with the spices.
Bake vegetables in the oven.
Cook the beans on the stove top.
Once rice is cooked mix in a large handful of chopped coriander and some lime juice.
Assemble burrito

recipes.title: Eggplant sambar
steps: Cook rice.
Cook mustard seeds until they pop. Add the fenugreek seeds, red chiles, curry leaves, onion and garlic.
Add the spices and tomatoes.
Add in vegetables and bring to a simmer to cook them.

recipes.title: Eggplant pizza thing
ingredients: 450g strong white bread flour (pick your favourite I use Doves Farm)
steps: Cut the aubergines in wedges, place them in a bowl.
Add salt and olive oil.
Mix everything with your hands.
Place on a roasting tray covered with some baking parchment.
Put it in the oven at 210C for around 25-30min - The aubergines need to be roasted, their colour will tell you.
When you take them out of the oven put them in a bowl with all the marinating ingredients and mix well.
Leave to rest for 1 hour min. If you do this the previous day you can put everything in the fridge to marinate otherwise you can leave it out.
Wait over night.
When the pizza dough is ready to bake, oil the tins lightly, spread the dough there.
Cook at 230C for around 8-10min.
You have to check the bottom of the pizzas really, tap them with the flat of a knife and see what noise they make as it very much depends on your oven.
When the pizza base is done, put the aubergines on and buffalo mozzarella broken in big chunks.

recipes.title: Creamy Sun Dried Tomato Pasta
ingredients: 220 g farfalle or fettuccine other pasta
1/4 tsp sage, onion powder, garlic powder, thyme
1/2 tsp each of oregano ,thyme or 1 tsp italian blend
1/4 cup (27.5 g) or more chopped sun dried tomato
fresh thyme or basil for garnish
steps: Heat the water or broth until just about boiling. Combine the soy curls with boiling broth, garlic powder, poultry seasoning in bowl. (Or soak in hot chikin flavored broth). Let sit for 10 mins, stir once or twice in between. You can also use other chikin subs, seitan. If using mushrooms or pressed tofu, skip this step.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Squeeze the soy curls to remove excess water and add to the skillet. Cook to brown some edges (3 to 5 mins, longer with mushrooms).
Add garlic, black pepper and mix in. Add poultry seasoning and smoked paprika. Add other veggies if using and cook for 2 mins.  (red bell pepper or zucchini work well).
Add cashew milk, salt, garlic, onion powder, oregano, thyme and mix well. Bring to a boil.

Add the sun dried tomato, spinach, nutritional yeast or vegan parm and bring to a boil. Taste and adjust salt, flavor (add more italian herbs if neeses). Add some lemon zest or more nutritional yeast/vegan parm  Fold in the cooked pasta and toss to coat. Take of heat, cover and let sit for minute. Garnish with fresh herbs, Serve with garlic bread.

recipes.title: Marinated teriyaki eggplant
steps: Drain and press the tofu
Whisk the sauce ingredients in a bowl, making sure the sugar is dissolved.
Cut the eggplant, tofu and peppers into small chunks and halve the pak choi, place in a large bowl and then pour the marinade over the top. Stir and make sure it is all coated, set aside.
Let marinate for at least 20 minutes, stirring a few times.
Clean and cook the rice.
Place a frying pan on the stove over medium-high heat. Once hot place the marinated peppers and eggplant in.
Pour over any excess marinade over the top whilst cooking.

recipes.title: Mashed potatoes
steps: Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes; drain.
In a saucepan heat butter and milk on low until butter is melted.
Using a potato masher slowly blend milk mixture into potatoes until smooth and creamy.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Crispy potato pancakes
steps: In a large bowl combine all of the ingredients until it becomes a soft dough.
In a frying pan over medium-low heat, add 2 tablespoons of butter or oil.
Once hot, scoop the potatoes mixture by the tablespoon and flatten into the pan, forming a pancake.
Cook in batches and until golden brown, about 3-5 minutes per side. Drain on a paper towel and let cool.

recipes.title: Tomatillo Salsa Verde
steps: Place tomatillos, onion, garlic, and chile pepper into a saucepan. Season with cilantro, oregano, cumin, and salt; pour in water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the tomatillos are soft, 10 to 15 minutes.
Using a blender, carefully puree the tomatillos and water in batches until smooth.

recipes.title: Easy Chicken Enchiladas Verdes
steps: Sauce:

Place tomatillos, onion, garlic, and chile pepper into a saucepan. Season with cilantro, oregano, cumin, and salt; pour in water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the tomatillos are soft, 10 to 15 minutes.
Using a blender, carefully puree the tomatillos and water in batches until smooth.
Enchiladas:
Begin by cooking each tortilla for 25 seconds in cooking oil at medium heat then set to the side.
To assemble enchiladas, place about 3 ounces of tomatillo sauce on the bottom of a casserole dish.

Fill each softened tortilla and roll about 1.5 ounces of chicken in each tortilla then place each rolled enchilada seam side down in the casserole dish. Repeat this step until all of the tortillas are rolled with chicken and placed in the casserole dish.
Once the enchiladas are in the casserole dish, cover enchiladas with remaining tomatillo sauce.
Top enchiladas with Monterrey Jack cheese and bake 15 minutes. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Sweet and sour tofu
steps: Drain and press the tofu
Whisk the sauce ingredients in a bowl, making sure the sugar is dissolved.
Add cubed tofu to a large bowl. Sprinkle 1 tbsp cornstarch, flour, salt, garlic, and pepper.
Close the top of the bowl with a plate or lid and shake to coat.
Add more cornstarch and shake again.
Wash and cook the rice.
Cook tofu in batches.
Cook the vegetables in order, once all are done add the tofu and sauce then stir to coat.
If sauce doesn't thicken then add a cornstarch slurry.

recipes.title: Avocado toast
steps: Toast bread in toaster.
Cut avocado into slices.
Once toasted butter the bread.
Top with lime juice and chilli flakes if you like.

recipes.title: Burgers
steps: Season patties
Cook patties
Cut veggies
Cut buns open
Assemble burgers

recipes.title: Wedges
steps: Cut potatoes into wedges
Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl
Add potatoes to bowl
Add some oil
Cover bowl and shake till well mixed
Cook for ~20 minutes at 180

recipes.title: Vegan bun chay
ingredients: 2 tablespoons freshly grated lemongrass (white part only)
steps: Set a large pot of water on the stove to boil.
Whisk the dressing ingredients together in a small bowl. Set aside to infuse.
Cook the noodles according to package directions; rinse with cold water, drain well.
Heat one tablespoon of peanut oil in a large skillet, add the tofu pieces and fry until golden brown.
While tofu is frying, stir soy sauce, sesame oil, and sugar in a small bowl until the sugar has dissolved.
Once tofu is browned, pour this mixture into the pan. Allow the sauce to cook in the pan until it thickens
Flip the tofu to ensure the sauce coats and sticks to each side.
Top the noodle bowls with tofu, carrot, bell pepper, avocado, red onion, herbs, and peanuts.
Pour a quarter of the prepared dressing over each serving.

recipes.title: Green curry
steps: Heat the wok. Add vegetable oil and green curry paste.
Add a splash of the coconut milk, stirring until it forms a paste.
Cook the rice
Add the ginger, garlic and beans, cook a little. Add the bell peppers, the rest of the coconut milk, and the eggplant.
Season with the lime juice and sugar. Increase the heat to medium high and bring to a boil for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in the bamboo shoots, kaffir leaves
Add the Thai basil.

recipes.title: Ratatouille
steps: Preheat the oven for 190˚C.
Slice the eggplant, tomatoes, squash, and zucchini into approximately ¹⁄₁₆-inch (1-mm) rounds, then set aside.
Make the sauce: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Sauté the onion, garlic, and bell peppers until soft, about 10 minutes.
Add the crushed tomatoes. Stir until the ingredients are fully incorporated.
Remove from heat, then add the basil.
Arrange the sliced veggies in alternating patterns on top of the sauce from the outer edge to the middle of the pan.
Cover the pan with foil and bake for 40 minutes.
Uncover, then bake for another 20 minutes, until the vegetables are softened.
Mix herb seasoning ingredients and pour over the cooked ratatouille.

recipes.title: Green curry paste
steps: Put ingredients in blender.
Blend.

recipes.title: Asian burger patties
steps: Blend the cashews until coarse crumbs.
Add the garlic, spring onion, ginger, shallots, lemongrass, coriander, eggs, curry paste and rice. Blend until a chunky paste.
Pat grated carrot and courgette with a paper towel to remove moisture
Stir in mushrooms, courgette and carrot.
Form into patties.
